verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. Behold, how good <WH2896> and how pleasant <WH5273> it is For brethren <WH251> to dwell <WH3427> together <WH3162> in unity <WH3162>!

It is like the precious <WH2896> oil <WH8081> upon the head <WH7218>, That ran down <WH3381> upon the beard <WH2206>, Even Aaron <WH175>'s beard <WH2206>; That came down <WH3381> upon the skirt <WH6310> of his garments <WH4060>;

Like the dew <WH2919> of Hermon <WH2768>, That cometh down <WH3381> upon the mountains <WH2042> of Zion <WH6726>: For there Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> the blessing <WH1293>, Even life <WH2416> for evermore <WH5769>.
